Evaluating Bias in Algorithms

The document discusses sources of bias in algorithms, including historical data, algorithmic choices, and evaluation bias. It also highlights measures to address bias such as pre-processing, in-processing, and post-processing methods.

  • Bias in algorithms
  • Sources of bias
  • Bias reduction measures
